author: sophia_24798
content: Are there any issues with including FOCIL in the same fork as shortening the slot duration? Imo this is upstream of the current discussion because delaying it longer than H* is a bad outcome

author: soispoke
content: I think the biggest risks are "unknown unknowns", not technical ones. I think there is a decent chance that FOCIL, by the H* fork, becomes unshippable because of regulatory/financial interests strongly advocating against it.
